RelatedSentence: The Alamogordo City commission at its meeting last week reviewed the possibility of opening areas of Bonito Lake but now might not be the time according to city staff .
At the request of District 5 City Commissioner Al Hernandez , city staff assessed the possibility of opening the Bonito Lake Campgrounds for recreational use .
According to city documents , city staff travelled to Bonito Lake in late April to make their assessment .
Assistant City Manager Matt McNeile presented their findings to the commission .
